Municipal Court
===============

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Municipal Court Location:**   Haskell City Hall  301 S 1st St.  Haskell, TX 79521 | **Mailing Address:**Haskell Municipal Court  P.O. Box 1003  Haskell, TX 79521 | **Crystal Manning**Municipal Court Clerk  [municipalclerk@haskelltexasusa.com](mailto:municipalclerk@haskelltexasusa.com) |

**The Municipal Clerk’s office is open Monday – Thursday, 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. and Friday, 8:00 a.m. – 4:00 p.m.**

I Got a Ticket, Now What?
-------------------------

Adults Have Three Basic Choices:

* You can pay the fine
* You can contest the ticket and go to court
* You can keep the ticket off your record in three ways:
  + Driving Safety Course
  + Deferred Disposition
  + Dismissal in the case of a ticket for a broken tail light or expired registration for example.

Drivers 16 and younger have these following options.
